column3: News;Phnom Penh:------ At 5:00 am on December 22
column5: the Department of Investigation and Enforcement of the General Department of Immigration detained 26 Thais
column6: including 9 women in connection with ------telephone scams------ targeting Thailand. They were sent through the Poipet international border for the Thai police to accept.------The move follows the Ministry of Interior’s announcement dated 27 and 29 November 2018.------The Thai people were arrested by Phnom Penh Military Police on February 7
column12: and sent to the Phnom Penh Municipal Court and later spent 10 months in prison.------ ------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/397804
